name: Zpeciation: Tough Days (TD)
description: Zpeciation TD is a successor of the classic Tower Defence genre in the post-apocalyptic setting. You are a leader of mercenaries serving the newly founded military power. 18 types of monsters, 8 unique maps, 8 types of weapons and 1 story.This game is sure to be enjoyed by the Tower Defence genre fans.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7.0 Processor: Core Duo2 3.33GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForse GTX650 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: yes
recommended_requirements: OS: 7.0 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: yes
